entity.name: Bette Midler
entity.description: American singer-songwriter, actress, comedian and film producer

text: @BetteMidler You do know, dear, that the coronavirus germinated in China, possibly in a lab?  Or that China is Communist and refused US help?  Or that Trump battles China for a return of US jobs?  What kind of preposterous windbag are you?
